languages.text: {n}Друкари с трудом сдерживает себя, чтобы не броситься вперед.{/n} "Каково... каково твое желание, {name}? Как тебе угодно умертвить этот скот?" {n}Маражай бросает на вас пылкий взгляд.{/n} "Скажи, и я исполню".

{n}Marazhai can barely keep himself from lunging at the humans.{/n} "What... what is your wish, {name}? How will it please you to destroy these cattle?" {n}Marazhai casts a feverish glance at you.{/n} "Tell me, and I will obey."
languages.original_text: {n}Друкари с трудом сдерживает себя, чтобы не броситься вперед.{/n} "Каково... каково твое желание, {name}? Как тебе угодно умертвить этот скот?" {n}Маражай бросает на вас пылкий взгляд.{/n} "Скажи, и я исполню".

{n}Marazhai can barely keep himself from lunging at the humans.{/n} "What... what is your wish, {name}? How will it please you to destroy these cattle?" {n}Marazhai casts a feverish glance at you.{/n} "Tell me, and I will obey."

{n}Marazhai can barely keep himself from lunging at the humans.{/n} "What... what is your wish, {name}? How will it please you to destroy these cattle?" {n}Marazhai casts a feverish glance at you.{/n} "Tell me, and I will obey."

{n}Marazhai can barely keep himself from lunging at the humans.{/n} "What... what is your wish, {name}? How will it please you to destroy these cattle?" {n}Marazhai casts a feverish glance at you.{/n} "Tell me, and I will obey."

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋勉力克制着自己，不让自己扑向那些人。{/n}“你……你的愿望是什么，{name}？我该怎么消灭这些牲畜，才会让你感到满意？”{n}玛拉斋朝你投来了狂热的一瞥。{/n}“告诉我吧，我会服从的。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai can barely keep himself from lunging at the humans.{/n} "What... what is your wish, {name}? How will it please you to destroy these cattle?" {n}Marazhai casts a feverish glance at you.{/n} "Tell me, and I will obey."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋勉力克制着自己，不让自己扑向那些人。{/n}“你……你的愿望是什么，{name}？我该怎么消灭这些牲畜，才会让你感到满意？”{n}玛拉斋朝你投来了狂热的一瞥。{/n}“告诉我吧，我会服从的。”

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは、人間に向かって突撃したいという衝動をかろうじて抑える。{/n}「何…お前の望みは何だ、{name}？この家畜を殺して、何が嬉しいんだ？」{n}マラズハイが熱い視線を投げてくる。{/n}「言え、お前に従ってやる」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai can barely keep himself from lunging at the humans.{/n} "What... what is your wish, {name}? How will it please you to destroy these cattle?" {n}Marazhai casts a feverish glance at you.{/n} "Tell me, and I will obey."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは、人間に向かって突撃したいという衝動をかろうじて抑える。{/n}「何…お前の望みは何だ、{name}？この家畜を殺して、何が嬉しいんだ？」{n}マラズハイが熱い視線を投げてくる。{/n}「言え、お前に従ってやる」

languages.text: {n}Marazhai apenas puede evitar abalanzarse sobre los humanos.{/n} «¿Qué... qué quieres hacer, {name}? ¿Cómo quieres sacrificar este ganado?». {n}Marazhai te mira, febril.{/n} «Dímelo y obedeceré».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai can barely keep himself from lunging at the humans.{/n} "What... what is your wish, {name}? How will it please you to destroy these cattle?" {n}Marazhai casts a feverish glance at you.{/n} "Tell me, and I will obey."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai apenas puede evitar abalanzarse sobre los humanos.{/n} «¿Qué... qué quieres hacer, {name}? ¿Cómo quieres sacrificar este ganado?». {n}Marazhai te mira, febril.{/n} «Dímelo y obedeceré».

languages.text: {n}C'est à peine si Marazhai parvient à se retenir de sauter à la gorge des humains.{/n} « Que... Que désirez-vous, {name} ? Comment souhaitez-vous voir mourir ces moutons ? {n}demande Marazhai en vous lançant un regard fiévreux.{/n} Vous n'avez qu'un mot à dire, et je m'exécuterai. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai can barely keep himself from lunging at the humans.{/n} "What... what is your wish, {name}? How will it please you to destroy these cattle?" {n}Marazhai casts a feverish glance at you.{/n} "Tell me, and I will obey."

traits.locale_text: {n}C'est à peine si Marazhai parvient à se retenir de sauter à la gorge des humains.{/n} « Que... Que désirez-vous, {name} ? Comment souhaitez-vous voir mourir ces moutons ? {n}demande Marazhai en vous lançant un regard fiévreux.{/n} Vous n'avez qu'un mot à dire, et je m'exécuterai. »

languages.text: {n}Marazhai muss sich extrem zurückhalten, um sich nicht auf die Menschen zu stürzen.{/n} "Was ... wünscht Ihr Euch, {name}? Wie gefällt es Euch am besten, dieses Vieh abzuschlachten?" {n}Marazhai wirft dir einen fieberhaften Blick zu.{/n} "Sagt es mir und ich werde gehorchen."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai can barely keep himself from lunging at the humans.{/n} "What... what is your wish, {name}? How will it please you to destroy these cattle?" {n}Marazhai casts a feverish glance at you.{/n} "Tell me, and I will obey."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai muss sich extrem zurückhalten, um sich nicht auf die Menschen zu stürzen.{/n} "Was ... wünscht Ihr Euch, {name}? Wie gefällt es Euch am besten, dieses Vieh abzuschlachten?" {n}Marazhai wirft dir einen fieberhaften Blick zu.{/n} "Sagt es mir und ich werde gehorchen."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, insanlara saldırmaktan kendini güç bela alıkoyabiliyor.{/n} "Arzun... Arzun nedir {name}? Bu sığırların nasıl yok edilmesinden memnun olursun?" {n}Marazhai, sana hararetli birkaç bakış atıyor.{/n} "Bana söyle ki itaat edeyim."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai can barely keep himself from lunging at the humans.{/n} "What... what is your wish, {name}? How will it please you to destroy these cattle?" {n}Marazhai casts a feverish glance at you.{/n} "Tell me, and I will obey."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai, insanlara saldırmaktan kendini güç bela alıkoyabiliyor.{/n} "Arzun... Arzun nedir {name}? Bu sığırların nasıl yok edilmesinden memnun olursun?" {n}Marazhai, sana hararetli birkaç bakış atıyor.{/n} "Bana söyle ki itaat edeyim."
